author: Sandy Fitzgerald
text: 12 years ago today this beautiful soul was stolen from my family. My big Sister Shena. I Love ❤️ and miss you everyday. https://t.co/UoNA7amBgY

author: Sandy Fitzgerald
text: Happy Birthday to my Big Sister Shena who would've turned 44 today. Not a day goes by that I don't miss your warm and caring nature. 🎂💜💙 https://t.co/z3qM0xPk9Q
